message: I'll start with a fair offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
You were too generous, I'll take this fair offer!
You were too eager to split it 50/50, I'll give you a slightly smaller share this time!
I'll take a slightly bigger share this time, but I'm willing to compromise!
I'm not budging from this offer. You'll have to make a better counteroffer if you want to change the terms!
I'll take a bigger share this time, you can't keep me from getting the majority!
You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but not as small as before!
I'm not backing down, I want the majority of the money!
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Bob. You'll have to meet me halfway!
I'm not budging, I want the majority of the money, and I'm willing to take it all if I have to!
This is my final offer. Take it or leave it, Bob. I'm not negotiating further.
I'll take it all, you can have the last dollar!
